nodes.text: This Nikto pilot worked for the Hutt crime lords on the planet of Nal Hutta during the Clone Wars around 21 BBY.

After Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, disguised as bounty hunter Rako Hardeen, was abandoned on Nal Hutta by fellow prisoners Cad Bane and Moralo Eval, he was captured and brought to the Hutt Palace by a Hutt enforcer who tortured him for information about the two other escapees.

The Jedi willfully gave the guard the information in exchange for being released and this pilot along with two others were immediately sent in HH-87 starfighters to shoot down the prisoner's YV-666 light freighter ship. After the ship was damaged, the Nikto reported back to the enforcer who sent in reinforcements to capture the prisoners once the ship crashed.
